message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but that price is a little high for me.  How about $10,000?

I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,500. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $11,250?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $11,250. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I think I need to get closer to my minimum of $12,500. How about $12,000?
This is getting close, Alice. I'm willing to go up a bit to $11,500.  Do you think that would work?

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11,500, but I'd like to make a slight adjustment to make it more appealing. How about we settle at $11,750? This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
